evaluations.summary: This is the opening greeting of the interview with no technical content discussed yet. The recruiter established a friendly tone but needs to transition into substantive quant finance questions.

coaching_flags.context_quote: okay hi Jawad how are you I'm good I'm good

coaching_flags.message: Interviewer answered their own question ('how are you I'm good I'm good'), not giving candidate space to respond
coaching_flags.suggestion: Ask 'How are you?' and pause to let the candidate respond fully before continuing
coaching_flags.example_good: Hi Jawad, how are you? [pause for response] Great. Let's get started...
coaching_flags.context_quote: how are you I'm good I'm good

coaching_flags.message: Interview hasn't properly begun - need to transition to technical content after greeting
coaching_flags.suggestion: After pleasantries, provide a clear transition: 'Let me start by asking you about...' or 'Can you walk me through...'
coaching_flags.example_good: Thanks for joining. I'd like to start by understanding your experience with time series modeling. Can you tell me about a recent project?
coaching_flags.context_quote: okay hi Jawad how are you I'm good I'm good

evaluations.summary: This excerpt captures only the greeting and audio check at the very beginning of the interview. No technical content has been discussed yet, only pleasantries and logistics.

coaching_flags.message: Interviewer is engaging in small talk and pleasantries that consume interview time without assessing candidate skills
coaching_flags.suggestion: Keep introductions brief (under 30 seconds). Move quickly to substantive technical questions after confirming audio/video works
coaching_flags.example_good: Hi Jawad, good to meet you. I can hear you fine. Let's dive in - tell me about a recent quantitative project you worked on.
coaching_flags.context_quote: okay hi Jawad how are you I'm good I'm good yes yes I

coaching_flags.message: Asked closed yes/no question about audio rather than transitioning to substantive content
coaching_flags.suggestion: After confirming logistics, immediately transition to open-ended technical questions
coaching_flags.example_good: Great, audio is working. Let's start with your experience - walk me through your approach to building a trading model from scratch.
coaching_flags.context_quote: Can you hear me? Yes, I can.

coaching_flags.message: Interviewer's speech is fragmented and unclear ('yes yes I'), suggesting lack of preparation or structure
coaching_flags.suggestion: Prepare a clear opening statement and first question in advance. Have your interview structure documented and ready

evaluations.summary: This excerpt shows only the initial connection phase with apparent technical/audio issues. No substantive quant finance topics were discussed, and the interviewer's speech became unclear or garbled.

coaching_flags.message: Interviewer appears to have audio/connection issues with repetitive unclear speech ('less as a clench come' repeated twice)
coaching_flags.suggestion: Test audio setup before the interview. If technical issues occur, pause and resolve them clearly: 'I'm having audio trouble, let me fix this quickly' rather than continuing with garbled communication
coaching_flags.example_good: Let me check my audio setup. Can you hear me clearly now?
coaching_flags.context_quote: will say less as a clench come less as a clench come

coaching_flags.message: No clear technical question was asked. The conversation consists only of connection checks and unclear speech
coaching_flags.suggestion: After confirming audio/video works, transition immediately to substantive content with a clear opening question like 'Let's start with your recent project on [topic from CV]. Can you walk me through your approach?'
coaching_flags.example_good: Great, now that we're connected, tell me about your experience with time series modeling in your previous role.
coaching_flags.context_quote: yes yes I... will say less as a clench come less as a clench come

coaching_flags.message: Only connection-testing closed questions were asked (Can you hear me?)
coaching_flags.suggestion: Once technical setup is confirmed, move quickly to open-ended technical questions that allow the candidate to demonstrate knowledge
coaching_flags.example_good: Now that we're all set, I'd like to understand your approach to model validation. How do you typically prevent overfitting in financial models?

coaching_flags.message: Interviewer's speech is unintelligible ('less as a clench come') suggesting technical or communication issues
coaching_flags.suggestion: Check audio quality and ensure clear articulation. If technical issues persist, restart the connection before proceeding with substantive questions
